Getting Started
---------------

Information to `install <install.html>`_, `test <test.html>`_, and `contribute <contribute.html>`_ to the package.

Documentation
-------------

The main documentation. This contains an in-depth description of
research-learn functionality and how to apply it. It also contains the
exact `API <api.html>`_ of all functions and classes, as given in
the docstring.

Examples
--------

A set of examples illustrating the use of research-learn. It
complements the `User Guide <user_guide.html>`_.

Additional Information
----------------------

`Release history <release_history.html>`_ section of research-learn.

See the `README <https://github.com/IMS-ML-Lab/research-learn/blob/master/README.rst>`_
for more information.
